```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
```

```{r}
weight3 <- import(here("data", "sesdata.rds"))
```

# First Draft
```{r}
weight3 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = SES, y = weight_loss_behavior_type, group = weight_loss_behavior_type)) +
  geom_density_ridges()
```

# Second Draft
```{r}
weight3 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = SES, y = weight_loss_behavior_type, fill = weight_loss_behavior_type)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.8) +  
  scale_fill_viridis_d() +
  theme_minimal() +
  stat_summary(
    aes(label = weight_loss_behavior_type),  # 레이블 내용
    fun = median,  # 중앙값에 위치하도록 설정
    geom = "text",
    color = "white",  # 글씨 색깔
    size = 2,  # 글씨 크기
    hjust = 0.8,  # 위치 조정 (왼쪽으로 약간 이동)
    vjust = -3
  ) +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_blank())  # y축 라벨 제거
```
